## redirect

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/app/interrupt/signals.ts" sourceLine="35" packageName="commandkit" />

Stops current command assuming it has been redirected to another command.

```ts title="Signature"
function redirect(): never
```
